summary: This bill, the Protecting Our Students and Taxpayers Act of 2025 (POST Act), amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to regulate proprietary institutions of higher education.  It establishes and defines an 85/15 rule, requiring such institutions to derive at least 15% of their revenue from non-federal education assistance sources. The bill provides detailed calculations for determining revenue, including guidelines for alternative financing agreements and institutional scholarships, and specifies how institutions can regain eligibility. It also makes conforming amendments to reflect the changes.
